name: Abandonment
description:
Introduction:

Kevin found his wife missing when he returned home from a business trip. He was worried that his wife would be kidnapped by a "pregnant killer". Kevin decided to set out to find his wife and uncover the truth behind her kidnapping.

Kevin's actions are controlled by keyboard and mouse to help him find his wife.

Gameplay:

The game is a 3-D horror adventure game, looking for the truth of his wife's disappearance in a horrible atmosphere.

F Turn on the flashlight.

The game contains horror, fright and so on.

Features:

Suspicious plot, do not know the truth of the matter until the last moment.

Tension-stimulating game experience.

Support for Windows
